title: Ticket #244: Help Arizona folks run their MIMAR MC-MC code on Condor
description: Miron asked me to help these guys run their codes.
remarks:
2009-Mar-05 10:59:40 by gthain:
This seems to be running now.

1) Talked to various UA networking people to get holes punched through firewalls. 2) Set Lowport/highport 3) Enabled flocking 4) Ran valgrind on their job, found memory errors.

They still need 3 months of runtime on each of 70 jobs, so it will take a while to finish.
creator: gthain
